com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMContentItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, IBMECMItem, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMContentItem
extends IBMECMItem
    Represents a single content item in the repository. Content items include documents (has content), folders (for storage), and other items stored in a repository. Each content item is associated with a content class that describes the metadata for the item.

    If the content item is a document, it can be versioned and grouped together by its version series id.

    • Method Detail

      • getVSId

        String getVSId()
        Returns the object's version series identifier. This is applicable only if the object is versionable. The version identifier is used to group different versions of content items together.
        Returns:
        the object's version series identifier

      • isCurrentVersion

        boolean isCurrentVersion()
        Returns whether this version is the current version of this content item.
        Returns:
        true if this version is the current version of the content item

        Returns:
        the IBMECMContentItemVersionStatus of this content item

      • getParent

        IBMECMContentItem getParent()
        Returns the containment parent of the content item. This is applicable only if the content item is containable.
        Returns:
        the containment parent of this content item

      • getContentClass

        IBMECMContentClass getContentClass()
        Returns the content class of this item. The IBMECMContentClass defines the template of how this item is constructed. This can be null until a retrieval is performed.
        Returns:
        the content class of this item

      • getMyRecommendation

        IBMECMSocialItem getMyRecommendation()
        Returns the current user's recommendation of this content item. A recommendation means the current user "liked" the item.
        Returns:
        the current user's recommendation of this content item

      • retrieveFolderContent

        void retrieveFolderContent(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves subfolders and content in a folder. The default page size is 25.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion handler that returns a IBMECMResultSet of IBMECMContentItem.

      • retrieveFolderContent

        void retrieveFolderContent(boolean foldersOnly,
                           String orderBy,
                           boolean descending,
                           int pageSize,
                           String teamspaceId,
                           IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves a folder's contents. Use the options to control how the results are returned.
        Parameters:
        foldersOnly - true to return only folders
        orderBy - the property to sort the results by
        descending - true to sort the results in descending order
        pageSize - the page size for the results. The default page size is 25. If null is passed in, the page size is determined by the server.
        teamspaceId - the teamspace id if the current folder is a folder within a teamspace
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a IBMECMResultSet of IBMECMContentItem.

      • retrieveFolderContent

        IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem> retrieveFolderContent(boolean foldersOnly,
                                                         String orderBy,
                                                         boolean descending,
                                                         int pageSize,
                                                         String teamspaceId)
        Retrieves a folder's contents synchronously. Use the options to control how the results are returned.
        Parameters:
        foldersOnly - true to return only folders
        orderBy - the property to sort the results by
        descending - true to sort the results in descending order
        pageSize - the page size for the results. The default page size is 25.
        teamspaceId - the teamspace id if the current folder is a folder within a teamspace
        Returns:
        a IBMECMResultSet of IBMECMContentItem.

      • retrieveContentClass

        void retrieveContentClass(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentClass> onComplete)
        Retrieves the IBMECMContentClass class object of this content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the IBMECMContentClass object associated with this content item

      • checkIn

        void checkIn(String fileName,
             String classId,
             IBMECMContentSourceType contentSourceType,
             String mimeType,
             InputStream data,
             IBMECMItemProperties properties,
             boolean asMinorVersion,
             IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete,
             IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Checks in a new version of a document. If the document is not already checked out, an exception occurs. You can also use updateDocumentItem(String, IBMECMItemProperties, String, String, boolean, InputStream, IBMECMCompletionHandler, IBMECMProgressListener), which performs a checkout and checkin in one collective call.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the content file or the URL for the external document to be checked in. For a document with no content, leave this null.
        classId - the id of the document class
        contentSourceType - the source type of the document content. See IBMECMContentSourceType.
        mimeType - the content MIME type
        data - the content of the file as an input stream
        properties - the properties to set when the document is checked in
        asMinorVersion - true to check in the document as a minor version
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a reference to itself if the document is checked in
        progressListener - the progress listener that reports how many bytes have been transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

      • checkIn

        IBMECMContentItem checkIn(String fileName,
                          String classId,
                          IBMECMContentSourceType contentSourceType,
                          String mimeType,
                          InputStream data,
                          IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                          boolean asMinorVersion)
        Checks in a new version of a document in a synchronous call. If the document is not already checked out, an exception occurs. You can also use updateDocumentItem(String, IBMECMItemProperties, String, String, boolean, InputStream, IBMECMCompletionHandler, IBMECMProgressListener), which performs a checkout and checkin in one collective call.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the content file or the URL for the external document to be checked in. For a document with no content, leave this null.
        classId - the id of the document class
        contentSourceType - the source type of the document content. See IBMECMContentSourceType.
        mimeType - the content MIME type
        data - the content of the file as an input stream
        properties - the properties to set when the document is checked in
        asMinorVersion - true to check in the document as a minor version
        Returns:
        the content item newly checked in

      • checkout

        void checkout(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Checks out a document. Checking out a document effectively locks the document and prevents changes by other users.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the checked out content item if the checkout is successful

      • checkout

        IBMECMContentItem checkout()
        Checks out a document. Checking out a document effectively locks the document and prevents changes by other users.
        Returns:
        the content item checked out

      • cancelCheckout

        void cancelCheckout(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Cancels the checkout on a document. The document must already be checked out. This effectively unlocks the document so others can make changes to it.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the content item that isn't checked out anymore if the cancellation is successful

      • cancelCheckout

        IBMECMContentItem cancelCheckout()
        Cancels the checkout on a document. The document must already be checked out. This effectively unlocks the document so others can make changes to it.
        Returns:
        the content item on which the checkout status is canceled

      • updateDocumentItem

        void updateDocumentItem(String className,
                        IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                        String mimeType,
                        String fileName,
                        boolean updateAsMinorVersion,
                        InputStream contentStream,
                        IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete,
                        IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Updates the content of a document in a single call. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the document class
        properties - the properties to set when the document is updated
        mimeType - the document MIME type
        fileName - the document file name
        updateAsMinorVersion - true to update as a minor version
        contentStream - the content of the document
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns an updated content item if successful
        progressListener - the progress listener that reports how many bytes have transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

      • updateDocumentItem

        IBMECMContentItem updateDocumentItem(String className,
                                     IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                                     String mimeType,
                                     String fileName,
                                     boolean updateAsMinorVersion,
                                     InputStream contentStream)
        Updates the content of a document in a single call. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the document class
        properties - the properties to set when the document is updated
        mimeType - the document MIME type
        fileName - the document file name
        updateAsMinorVersion - true to update as a minor version
        contentStream - the content of the document
        Returns:
        the content item on which it's updated

      • retrieveAttributes

        void retrieveAttributes(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Retrieves all or the remaining attributes and properties for this content item. Remaining attributes include recommendations, tags, download count, and comment count.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a reference to a content item with all attributes loaded

      • retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes

        void retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMItemProperties[]> onComplete)
        Retrieves all the attributes and properties for this content item. The attributes will be split into three categories in this order: system properties, user properties, item properties.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns an array of item properties split into different categories

      • saveAttributes

        void saveAttributes(IBMECMItemProperties attributes,
                    IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Saves the new attributes to this content item.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the new attributes of the content item to be saved
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a reference to this content item with updated properties if the call is successful

      • moveToFolder

        void moveToFolder(String targetFolderId,
                  String sourceFolderId,
                  boolean targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder,
                  IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Moves this content item from a source folder to a target folder.
        Parameters:
        targetFolderId - the target folder id
        sourceFolderId - the source folder id
        targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder - true if the target folder is a teamspace folder
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the content item that was moved if the call is successful

      • retrieveComments

        void retrieveComments(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMComment>> onComplete)
        Retrieves comments for this content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of comments if the call is successful

        void retrieveRecommendation(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMSocialItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves all recommendations, or "likes", for this content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of recommendations if the call is successful

        void addRecommendation(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMSocialItem> onComplete)
        Adds the current user's recommendation, or "like", for this content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the recommendation if the call is successful

      • deleteRecommendation

        void deleteRecommendation(IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Deletes the current user's recommendation, or a "like", for this content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the recommendation was deleted successfully

      • addComment

                IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMComment> onComplete)
        Adds a new comment for this content item.
        Parameters:
        commentText - the comment text to add
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a reference to the comment that is created if the call is successful

        void deleteComment(IBMECMComment comment,
                   IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Deletes a comment from this content item.
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment to be deleted
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the comment was deleted successfully

      • retrieveDocumentItem

        void retrieveDocumentItem(File destinationFile,
                          IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete,
                          IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Retrieves and downloads the document content from this content item.
        Parameters:
        destinationFile - the file path that this document's content will be downloaded to
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the download was successful
        progressListener - the progress listener that reports how many bytes have been transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

      • retrieveDocumentItem

        void retrieveDocumentItem(File destinationFile)
        Retrieves and downloads the document content from this content item.
        Parameters:
        destinationFile - the name of the file that this document's content will be downloaded to

      • retrieveConvertedDocument

        void retrieveConvertedDocument(String targetContentType,
                               File destinationFile,
                               IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete,
                               IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Retrieves and downloads the converted document content from this content item according to target content type.
        Parameters:
        targetContentType - the target content type to be converted
        destinationFile - the file path that this document's content will be downloaded to
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the download was successful
        progressListener - the progress listener that reports how many bytes have been transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

      • retrieveConvertedDocument

        void retrieveConvertedDocument(String targetContentType,
                               File destinationFile)
        Retrieves and downloads the converted document content from this content item according to target content type.
        Parameters:
        targetContentType - the target content type to be converted
        destinationFile - the file path that this document's content will be downloaded to

      • isOfflineEnabled

        boolean isOfflineEnabled()
        Returns whether this content item can be synchronized.
        Returns:
        true if this content item can be synchronized
